goal: Discuss your emotions as if you were in this situation: I felt caring when i helped an elderly lady carry her bags to her door.  She was struggling to carry some heavy bags and i offered her help.
scenario_instructions: When you start the chat, you will be given a scenario to discuss. For example, you may have the scenario “I lost my keys this morning. It was very stressful.” During the conversation, please talk as though you have experienced the scenario given. For this scenario, you might say something like “I had such a stressful morning! I couldn’t find my keys anywhere.” The goal of this task is to evaluate how well the chatbot communicates empathetically.
